attributes.action: Standardise the Daily Standing Charge for electricity throughout England.
attributes.background: Electricity customers in deprived and less populated regions are subsidising more affluent areas of England.

rejection.details:
Decisions about standing charges are a matter for utility providers and Ofgem, not the UK Government or Parliament. Standing charges taken into account by Ofgem when calculating the price cap, which is a cap on the cost utility companies can charge for a unit of gas and electricity. Find out more about the energy price cap, including how it includes standing charges, here: https://www.ofgem.gov.uk/check-if-energy-price-cap-affects-you.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611531
